name: Silent Eyes (ShijieSong)
description:
Silent Eyes is a walking simulator that focuses on the everyday life of a sickly writer who is unaware of his own circumstances. The game starts with the players “watching a stream”, deciding to play the game takes the players into the stream and they now find themselves playing as the streamer himself.

Made by: Shijie Song & Abhimanyu Chattopadhyay

from UAL MA games design
